attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are only a tiny isle and yet we have already over 60 million population we no longer have the houses the space and are once great british country side is now shrinking into a housing population. our JOBS are going, are money is being spent not on our own but on over people. I say we should look after our own before we look after others. LONG LIVE THE QUEEN AND GOD SAVE GREAT BRITAIN  the best country in the world

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
